it.unipr.netsec.nemo.examples.p1

Class P1Packet

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.nemo.examples.p1.P1Packet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Packet, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class P1Packet
extends java.lang.Object
implements Packet
    Packet of protocol P1.

    A P1 packet contains three string fields:

    • source address;
    • destination address;
    • payload.
    These fields are concatenated separated by a space, i.e.: packet := src + ' ' + dst + ' ' + payload.
